definition[0]: a small group of people who run a country or organization, or a country that is run by a small group of people
definition[1]: when a country or organization is run by a small group of people
example[0]: Eventually oligarchy took over from democracy.
definition[2]: when a country is ruled or controlled by a small group of people, usually from the same social class
definition[3]: a country, organization, industry etc controlled by a small group of people, or the group who control it
example[2]: The industry is dominated by an oligarchy of three oil companies.
